title: Still can't see jungle icons
body: The small jungle icons on the minimap that indicate a camp is up are no longer. I tried to initiate full repair but it doesn't work. I also tried using hextech repair with the reinstall option but it still won't work

replies.body:
If your icons aren't loading then I'd imagine that a bad game file would be failing to render it.  There's actually a toggle in the Interface options to enable Show Neutral Camps on the minimap.  Is that checked?  If it is but without success then your settings may be corrupt and not syncing to our servers.  In this case try resetting your config:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
So it turns out the option wasn't checked off after all. Thank you so much!
